Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<java.lang.String>, java.lang.Runnable
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<java.lang.String>, java.lang.Runnable
Sets up the client of the game.
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client()
      Creates a Client with the specified attributes.

  • Method Details

    • setupClient

      public void setupClient​(java.lang.String uiStyle, java.net.Socket socket)
      Sets up the Client.

      If there are any IOExceptions prints out the subsequent error.

      Parameters:
      uiStyle - Variable for the choice of the style of the ui.
      socket - Variable indicating the created socket.

    • run

      public void run()
      The Client starts running and the thread t0 gets ready to receive messages from Server through the socket.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • asyncReadFromSocket

      public java.lang.Thread asyncReadFromSocket​(java.io.ObjectInputStream socketIn)
      Starts a thread connected to a socket with the server.
      Parameters:
      socketIn - The socket which is used to connect with the server.
      Returns:
      The thread that was created and used with the socket.

    • setUi

      public void setUi​(Ui ui)
      Set of the ui variable.
      Parameters:
      ui - Variable that is used for the user interface.

    • writeToSocket

      public void writeToSocket​(java.lang.String input)
      Method that is used to send the choices of the user to the server.

      If the client received an Operation immediately before this input, the message will be processed as tile coordinates and the counter will be refreshed.

      If the client received a GameMessage, the input will be considered an answer.

      Parameters:
      input - A string that represents the input from the user.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Gets the status of the client's active attribute.
      Returns:
      The value of the attribute active.

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean active)
      Sets the client's active attribute.
      Parameters:
      active - Indicates if the client at issue is still connected or not.

    • splitMessage

      public void splitMessage​(Obj obj)
      Splits the obj,interprets it and updates the game state.
      Parameters:
      obj - Comes from the socket stream encapsulating game updates.

    • update

      public void update​(java.lang.String message)
      Updates the Observers based on the message. Notified by a Sender, it is going to send its message to the socket.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<java.lang.String>
      Parameters:
      message - Variable that indicates the changes of the Observable.
